trans-unit.resname: V11·1 | Cao Cao, Lord of Wei | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {T}: Target opponent discards two cards. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

trans-unit.resname: V11·2 | Captain Sisay | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {T}: Search your library for a legendary card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.resname: V11·2 | Captain Sisay | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Her leadership forged the *Weatherlight*'s finest crew.

trans-unit.resname: V11·3 | Doran, the Siege Tower | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Each creature assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

trans-unit.resname: V11·3 | Doran, the Siege Tower | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Each year that passes rings you inwardly with memory and might. Wield your heart, and the world will tremble."

trans-unit.resname: V11·4 | Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Haste {T}: Put a token that's a copy of target nonlegendary creature you control onto the battlefield. That token has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

trans-unit.resname: V11·5 | Kresh the Bloodbraided | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature dies, you may put X +1/+1 counters on Kresh the Bloodbraided, where X is that creature's power.

trans-unit.resname: V11·5 | Kresh the Bloodbraided | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Each of his twenty-two braids is bound with bone and leather from a foe.

trans-unit.resname: V11·6 | Mikaeus, the Lunarch | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Mikaeus, the Lunarch enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mikaeus. {T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Mikaeus: Put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

trans-unit.resname: V11·7 | Omnath, Locus of Mana | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Green mana doesn't empty from your mana pool as steps and phases end. Omnath, Locus of Mana gets +1/+1 for each green mana in your mana pool.

trans-unit.resname: V11·7 | Omnath, Locus of Mana | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It gathers against the coming storm.

trans-unit.resname: V11·8 | Oona, Queen of the Fae | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying {X}{UB}: Choose a color. Target opponent exiles the top X cards of his or her library. For each card of the chosen color exiled this way, put a 1/1 blue and black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: V11·9 | Progenitus | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Protection from everything If Progenitus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Progenitus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

trans-unit.resname: V11·9 | Progenitus | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Soul of the World has returned.

trans-unit.resname: V11·10 | Rafiq of the Many | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gains double strike until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: V11·10 | Rafiq of the Many | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Many sigils, one purpose.

trans-unit.resname: V11·11 | Sharuum the Hegemon | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying When Sharuum the Hegemon enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: V11·11 | Sharuum the Hegemon | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: To gain audience with the hegemon, one must bring a riddle she has not heard.

trans-unit.resname: V11·12 | Sun Quan, Lord of Wu | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control have horsemanship. (They can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

trans-unit.resname: V11·12 | Sun Quan, Lord of Wu | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "One score and four he reigned, the Southland king: / A dragon coiled, a tiger poised below the mighty Yangtze."

trans-unit.resname: V11·13 | Teferi, Mage of Zhalfir | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flash Creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield have flash. Each opponent can cast spells only any time he or she could cast a sorcery.

trans-unit.resname: V11·13 | Teferi, Mage of Zhalfir | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: To save this plane, he must forsake all others.

trans-unit.resname: V11·14 | Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you cast Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre, destroy target permanent. Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.) Ulamog is indestructible. When Ulamog is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.

trans-unit.resname: V11·15 | Visara the Dreadful | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying {T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

trans-unit.resname: V11·15 | Visara the Dreadful | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "My eyes are my strongest feature."
